name: Solar Tycoon
description:
This is a LUDUM DARE #32 game that has been extended and improved.

You had the nightmare again. The disaster happens and the power goes out and all bedlam ensure in a matter of days the entire city has turned into an angry starving mob.

But this time it was different as you realised that with renewable energy everywhere the lights would stay on and civilisation would prevail over a collapse into anarchy.

And your destiny is to be the Solar Energy Tycoon that will thrust back the darkness with the renewable energy weapons, solar panels, wind farms, geothermal, tidal and wave energy systems.

But where to start...

Mouse controls.

WASD to move camera.

Mouse Wheel zoom in out.
